title: Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins Christmas Cloth Napkins 17 x 17" Reusable Christmas Religious Napkins Holiday Cloth Napkins O Holy Night Napkins for Christmas Party Nativity Scene(Blue)
descriptions:
Introducing the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins! These beautiful napkins are the perfect addition to your holiday table setting. 

Featuring a Christmas Nativity scene design, these napkins add a festive touch to any occasion. Made from high-quality polyester, they have a smooth and glossy finish that adds elegance to your table. The napkins come in a vibrant blue color with gold embroidered texts, adding a touch of luxury to your dining experience.

Measuring 17 x 17 inches (43 x 43 cm), these napkins are the ideal size for any place setting. They are washable and reusable, making them not only environmentally friendly but also convenient for frequent use.

The embroidered sayings on the napkins include "Joy," "Love," "Blessed," "Merry," "Believe," and "Peace," adding a meaningful touch to your table decor. These napkins are not only perfect for Christmas gatherings and meals but also for other religious or festive occasions.

This set of 12 embroidered Christmas cloth napkins is a thoughtful gift idea for family, friends, or fellow believers. The package contents include 12 napkins, allowing you to easily set a beautiful table for your guests.

Please note that there might be slight errors in size due to manual measurement, and there could be a slight difference in color due to screen display. Furthermore, the words used on the napkins are not intended to be used as a trademark, but rather for expression purposes.

Upgrade your holiday table setting with the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins. Order now and add a touch of elegance and meaning to your celebrations!
